L.A. Wang
E. Shechtman
J. Sivic
T. Darrell
B. Russell
dcterms:description: The videos in the Distinct Describable Moments (DiDeMo) dataset are collected from Flickr. Each query contains the temporal annotations from at least 4 different annotators.
dcterms:title: DiDeMo

dcterms:creator: G.A. Sigurdsson
G. Varol
X. Wang
A. Farhadi
I. Laptev
A. Gupta
dcterms:description: The Charades-STA dataset is built upon the original Charades dataset which contains video-level paragraph descriptions and temporal annotations for activities. It is created by breaking down the paragraphs to generate sentence-level annotations and aligning the sentences with corresponding video segments.
dcterms:title: Charades-STA
